attributes.action: People of Great Britain DEMAND a Referendum on the introduction of Digital ID.
attributes.additional_details: This is not ‘ the governments’ decision to make without our consent!  The people of Great Britain should make the decision on this as it will affect all aspects of our lives. It is VITAL that we have OUR say on this matter. Put it to a national vote via a referendum.
attributes.background: WE the people of Great Britain DEMAND that our ‘ employees’ ( the Government) give us a voice via a referendum on the introduction of a “ mandatory digital ID” WE want the choice of how our lives are shaped! This was not in labours manifesto, and as such goes against our democratic rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
